title: Problem-Based Scaffolding Curriculum for Strengthening Practical Accounting Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology and understanding of financial statement structures
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance general citizens' financial literacy through accounting problem-solving centered on real-life scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can explain changes in financial status with 80% accuracy by analyzing real business cases.
Learners can complete budget plans for individuals or small businesses with 90% accuracy with scaffolding support.
Learners can improve their accounting approaches in three or more ways based on peer feedback during problem-solving.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Utilization App

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
